title: Going to the Dentist
description: Going to the dentist can bring up all sorts of feelings for children. In this book, children will relate to the character's fear about her very first dentist appointment. As she proceeds, step-by-step, through the appointment, her fears dissipate, and her readers can also experience new confidence. Photographs support the text. Simple sentences and a topic near a child's heart will make this book a success in the classroom.
